description: large book in gray felt wrapper with large zipper; book has slightly tacky brown coating on cover with silver foil; geometric patterns in same brown coating with silver text inside; lender's archive #180
medium: Paint and lacquer; letterpress in silver ink; with pasteboard binding and gray felt case and zipper closure
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: The 32 Superior Beauties of Buddha's Person
